name: Higher Eyes
description:
⚠️  A very small percentage of people may experience seizures when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns that may appear in this video game.

⚠️ This game has no mute button. Sorry for the inconvenience.

- > INSTRUCTIONS 

  - Objective: Get the max possible points.    

  - To get points, when the circle is touching the shapes, hold the key associated with the shape. When the player misses, he loses HP and the multiplier resets to 1.

- > CONTROLS

   -  Left Side: W,A,S,D Keys

   -  Right Side: Arrow Keys

- > MODES 

    - 1 Player: the player uses the WASD and ARROW keys. 

    - 2 Players: the 1st player uses the WASD keys, the 2nd player uses the ARROW keys.

-> Development Story

  I created this game on Construct 2 for an assignment in a Course of Game Production that I attended. The purpose was to create a simple platform game, but since I know how to code, I needed a challenge. So I created this skilled based game. During the production, I went to a birthday party and asked the DJs to record the performance and send it to me to be the soundtrack of the game.

-> Special Thanks
